description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.5 operating system is now available with new and enhanced capabilities, as well as updated components. Here’s what’s new!

The post Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.5 Released with Sudo System Role and Podman 5.0 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.5 Released with Sudo System Role and Podman 5.0

description:
Fedora Linux 42 promises to port the Anaconda installer to Wayland and ship with the Anaconda WebUI by default for Fedora Workstation.

The post Fedora 42 to Port the Anaconda Installer to Wayland, Default to Anaconda WebUI appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fedora 42 to Port the Anaconda Installer to Wayland, Default to Anaconda WebUI

description:
Valve released a new stable Steam Client update to further improve native Linux gaming, the new Game Recording feature, Steam VR, and more.

The post Valve Releases Steam Client Update to Further Improve Native Linux Gaming appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Valve Releases Steam Client Update to Further Improve Native Linux Gaming
